properties.Title: NATO Headquarters
properties.Desc: My six months internship program at the NATO Headquarters has evolved into a longer journey which I enjoy every second of it! Having been here more than 2 years, I had the chance to work on cutting edge defence technology projects, with amazing people in this multinational civil-military joint environment.

properties.Title: ''It doesn't take an army! It takes a few good people.''
properties.Desc:
This was my former boss' motto and the exact definition of my team at Solvoyo. Being the COO of a high-tech start-up, Nilufer has always been a great mentor and source of inspiration for me. Not only she has always encouraged me to push my limits and grow in multiple domains, but also has put her trust in me and stood by me just like a true leader.
After joining NATO, I have updated the good old 'It does not take an army...' motto though. Still, I agree it does not take an army, but it takes thirty of them!
